feed.title: Nagoya University, Graduate School of Law (en/News)
feed.rights: Copyright 2014 Faculty of Law, Nagoya University

div.p: We have deployed a new tool for publishing news items to the GSL website that should help us to keep the top page content up to date.
Thanks are due to one and all for your patience pending this long-awaited revamp of our information service. This is the first of many announcements to follow.

entry.title: Nagoya Team at the Willem C. Vis (East) International Commercial Arbitration Moot

div.p: A team from Nagoya University will be participating in 11th Willem C. Vis (East) International Commercial Arbitration Moot in Hong Kong, 1-6 April 2014. The moot is an annual competition among teams from law schools throughout the world, run in parallel with the Willem C. Vis International Commercial Arbitration Moot in Vienna.
The University will be represented this year by Naoyuki Okano, Maksud Karaketov, Marzuki Sinambela, Bolor Erdene-Dorjgotov, and Jacek Kozikowski, in the first appearance by Nagoya in the competition.
